00035 __device int quick_floor(float x)
00036 {
00037     return (int)x - ((x < 0) ? 1 : 0);
00038 }
00039 
00040 __device float bits_to_01(uint bits)
00041 {
00042     return bits * (1.0f/(float)0xFFFFFFFF);
00043 }
00044 
00045 __device uint hash(uint kx, uint ky, uint kz)
00046 {
00047     // define some handy macros
00048 #define rot(x,k) (((x)<<(k)) | ((x)>>(32-(k))))
00049 #define final(a,b,c) \
00050 { \
00051     c ^= b; c -= rot(b,14); \
00052     a ^= c; a -= rot(c,11); \
00053     b ^= a; b -= rot(a,25); \
00054     c ^= b; c -= rot(b,16); \
00055     a ^= c; a -= rot(c,4);  \
00056     b ^= a; b -= rot(a,14); \
00057     c ^= b; c -= rot(b,24); \
00058 }
00059     // now hash the data!
00060     uint a, b, c, len = 3;
00061     a = b = c = 0xdeadbeef + (len << 2) + 13;
00062 
00063     c += kz;
00064     b += ky;
00065     a += kx;
00066     final(a, b, c);
00067 
00068     return c;
00069     // macros not needed anymore
00070 #undef rot
00071 #undef final
00072 }
00073 
00074 __device int imod(int a, int b)
00075 {
00076     a %= b;
00077     return a < 0 ? a + b : a;
00078 }
00079 
00080 __device uint phash(int kx, int ky, int kz, int3 p) 
00081 {
00082     return hash(imod(kx, p.x), imod(ky, p.y), imod(kz, p.z));
00083 }
00084 
00085 __device float floorfrac(float x, int* i)
00086 {
00087     float f = floorf(x);
00088     *i = (int)f;
00089     return x - f;
00090 }
00091 
00092 __device float fade(float t)
00093 {
00094     return t * t * t * (t * (t * 6.0f - 15.0f) + 10.0f);
00095 }
00096 
00097 __device float nerp(float t, float a, float b)
00098 {
00099     return (1.0f - t) * a + t * b;
00100 }
00101 
00102 __device float grad(int hash, float x, float y, float z)
00103 {
00104     // use vectors pointing to the edges of the cube
00105     int h = hash & 15;
00106     float u = h<8 ? x : y;
00107     float v = h<4 ? y : h==12||h==14 ? x : z;
00108     return ((h&1) ? -u : u) + ((h&2) ? -v : v);
00109 }
00110 
00111 __device float scale3(float result)
00112 {
00113     return 0.9820f * result;
00114 }
00115 
00116 __device_noinline float perlin(float x, float y, float z)
00117 {
00118     int X; float fx = floorfrac(x, &X);
00119     int Y; float fy = floorfrac(y, &Y);
00120     int Z; float fz = floorfrac(z, &Z);
00121 
00122     float u = fade(fx);
00123     float v = fade(fy);
00124     float w = fade(fz);
00125 
00126     float result;
00127 
00128     result = nerp (w, nerp (v, nerp (u, grad (hash (X  , Y  , Z  ), fx   , fy    , fz     ),
00129                                         grad (hash (X+1, Y  , Z  ), fx-1.0f, fy  , fz     )),
00130                                nerp (u, grad (hash (X  , Y+1, Z  ), fx   , fy-1.0f, fz    ),
00131                                         grad (hash (X+1, Y+1, Z  ), fx-1.0f, fy-1.0f, fz      ))),
00132                       nerp (v, nerp (u, grad (hash (X  , Y  , Z+1), fx   , fy    , fz-1.0f ),
00133                                         grad (hash (X+1, Y  , Z+1), fx-1.0f, fy  , fz-1.0f )),
00134                                nerp (u, grad (hash (X  , Y+1, Z+1), fx   , fy-1.0f, fz-1.0f ),
00135                                         grad (hash (X+1, Y+1, Z+1), fx-1.0f, fy-1.0f, fz-1.0f ))));
00136     return scale3(result);
00137 }
00138 
00139 __device_noinline float perlin_periodic(float x, float y, float z, float3 pperiod)
00140 {
00141     int X; float fx = floorfrac(x, &X);
00142     int Y; float fy = floorfrac(y, &Y);
00143     int Z; float fz = floorfrac(z, &Z);
00144 
00145     int3 p;
00146 
00147     p.x = max(quick_floor(pperiod.x), 1);
00148     p.y = max(quick_floor(pperiod.y), 1);
00149     p.z = max(quick_floor(pperiod.z), 1);
00150 
00151     float u = fade(fx);
00152     float v = fade(fy);
00153     float w = fade(fz);
00154 
00155     float result;
00156 
00157     result = nerp (w, nerp (v, nerp (u, grad (phash (X  , Y  , Z  , p), fx   , fy    , fz     ),
00158                                         grad (phash (X+1, Y  , Z  , p), fx-1.0f, fy  , fz     )),
00159                                nerp (u, grad (phash (X  , Y+1, Z  , p), fx   , fy-1.0f, fz    ),
00160                                         grad (phash (X+1, Y+1, Z  , p), fx-1.0f, fy-1.0f, fz      ))),
00161                       nerp (v, nerp (u, grad (phash (X  , Y  , Z+1, p), fx   , fy    , fz-1.0f ),
00162                                         grad (phash (X+1, Y  , Z+1, p), fx-1.0f, fy  , fz-1.0f )),
00163                                nerp (u, grad (phash (X  , Y+1, Z+1, p), fx   , fy-1.0f, fz-1.0f ),
00164                                         grad (phash (X+1, Y+1, Z+1, p), fx-1.0f, fy-1.0f, fz-1.0f ))));
00165     return scale3(result);
00166 }
00167 
00168 /* perlin noise in range 0..1 */
00169 __device float noise(float3 p)
00170 {
00171     float r = perlin(p.x, p.y, p.z);
00172     return 0.5f*r + 0.5f;
00173 }
00174 
00175 /* perlin noise in range -1..1 */
00176 __device float snoise(float3 p)
00177 {
00178     return perlin(p.x, p.y, p.z);
00179 }
00180 
00181 /* cell noise */
00182 __device_noinline float cellnoise(float3 p)
00183 {
00184     uint ix = quick_floor(p.x);
00185     uint iy = quick_floor(p.y);
00186     uint iz = quick_floor(p.z);
00187 
00188     return bits_to_01(hash(ix, iy, iz));
00189 }
00190 
00191 __device float3 cellnoise_color(float3 p)
00192 {
00193     float r = cellnoise(p);
00194     float g = cellnoise(make_float3(p.y, p.x, p.z));
00195     float b = cellnoise(make_float3(p.y, p.z, p.x));
00196 
00197     return make_float3(r, g, b);
00198 }
00199 
00200 /* periodic perlin noise in range 0..1 */
00201 __device float pnoise(float3 p, float3 pperiod)
00202 {
00203     float r = perlin_periodic(p.x, p.y, p.z, pperiod);
00204     return 0.5f*r + 0.5f;
00205 }
00206 
00207 /* periodic perlin noise in range -1..1 */
00208 __device float psnoise(float3 p, float3 pperiod)
00209 {
00210     return perlin_periodic(p.x, p.y, p.z, pperiod);
00211 }
